physical_appearance: This is a panoramic view of the Singapore/ Little India landscape. The artist has pieced together multiple canvasses to create this panorama. The imagery includes the various signages, buildings, and architectural elements of the precinct.
sgcool_label_text: "The panoramic view of the Singapore/Little India landscape includes major buildings and signs that are part of the history of Little India and its communities. The people and communities of Little India, past and present, are painted against this backdrop. The painting juxtaposes the precinct's history and contemporary narrative seamlessly, with hundreds of people placed next to each other, in a nod to the continuing growth and story of the locality. Shop signs, buildings, architectural elements, and ""notes"" from the artist about the history of the precicnt pop up in the multi-canvas panorama."
title_text: Passage to Little India (Community Portraits Panorama Painting)
